articles.title: Sydney to exit Covid-19 lockdown next week after vaccination rate hits 70% - TODAYonline
articles.description: SYDNEY — Covid-19 restrictions will be eased further in Sydney from Monday (Oct 11), authorities said, as Australia's largest city looks set to exit a nearly four-month lockdown after hitting its 70 per cent full vaccination target.
